content.rendered:
Directed by Sudha Kongara.

Written by Sudha Kongara. Sudha Kongara. Sudha Kongara. Madhavan. Arun Matheswaran. Manoj Tapadia. Manoj Tripathi. Amitabh Verma.

Cast Madhavan(Adi Tomar). Ritika Singh(Ezhil Madhi). Nassar(Punch Pandian (as Nasser)). Mumtaz Sorcar(Lakshmi (Lux)). M.K. Raina(Rakesh). Radha Ravi(Muralikrishnan). Kaali Venkat(Saamikannu (Sam)). Baljinder Kaur(Damayanthi) .Bipin.Bipin.Olympic Devarajan. Talib Mehdi(Boxing Judge).Ashiqa Salvan. Raj Sharma(Journalist).Ravindra Vijay. Zakir Hussain(Dev Khatri (uncredited))

Languages Tamil. Hindi.

Producers Rajkumar Hirani. C.V. Kumar. Madhavan. S. Sashikanth. Avinash Viswanathan.

Production Rajkumar Hirani Films. Thirukumaran Entertainment.
